thread.title: Mike Patterson
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Mike Patterson

author: Mike Patterson
title: Mike Patterson
text: I needed a bed for my 86 year old mother, who had to be moved in with my niece, and she needed it right away . I went to American Frieght and found a very comfortable mattress, box spring, and rails for less than $300. She loved the bed and had great nights of sleep since.
